metadata.title: CVE-2022-23218 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The deprecated compatibility function svcunix_create in the sunrpc moduleof the GNU C Library (aka glibc) through 2.34 copies its path argument onthe stack without validating its length, which may result in a bufferoverflow, potentially resulting in a denial of service or (if anapplication is not built with a stack protector enabled) arbitrary codeexecution.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
